exclusion.criterion: ICD system. Standard of care follow-up will continue thru 24 months.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled ventricular arrhythmias within 7 days of enrollment (defined as VT/VF >30 seconds and/or causing hemodynamic instability and/or symptoms of pre-syncope or syncope)
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
